known_issues: Only a subset of the 19 departments are currently visible; list is not scrollable

existing_features.title: Update the Zone select dropdown in `frontend/src/components/DiscoverFilters.tsx` so the departments list is vertically scrollable and all 19 Uruguay departments can be reached on typical mobile viewport sizes.

new_feature_requests.summary: Allow scrolling in the departments list so all 19 departments are visible

projectName: Make the Zone (Uruguay departments) dropdown scrollable so all 19 departments are accessible
